tests.title: CT 1: Law & Constitution (Making of the Constitution)
tests.description: Drafting of the Constitution of India, Constituent Assembly

tests.title: CT 2: Law & Constitution (Basic of the Constitution)
tests.description: Written Constitution, Preamble, Federal Structure of Government.

tests.title: CT 3: Law & Constitution (Citizenship)
tests.description: Citizenship of India, Citizenship by (birth, descent, registration)

tests.title: CT 4: Law & Constitution (Fundamental Rights)
tests.description: Right to equality, Right to freedom, etc

tests.title: CT 5: Law & Constitution (DPSP)
tests.description: Application of the Directive Principles,  right to work, to education and to public assistance

tests.title: CT 6: Law & Constitution (Fundamental Duties)
tests.description: Basic of Fundamental Duties

tests.title: CT 7: Law & Constitution (Important Articles)
tests.description: Important Articles related to Union and State

tests.title: CT 8: Law & Constitution (Important Amendments)
tests.description: Amendments of the Indian Constitution and Fundamental Development.

tests.title: CT 9: Law & Constitution (Central Government)
tests.description: President of India, Vice President of India, Prime minister etc

tests.title: CT 10: Law & Constitution (State Government)
tests.description: Governor, Chief Minister, State Council of Ministers

tests.title: CT 11: Law & Constitution (Union Territories)
tests.description: Union and its Territories

tests.title: CT 12: Law & Constitution (Local Government)
tests.description: Panchayat and Municipalities

tests.title: CT 13: Law & Constitution (Scheduled and Tribal Areas)
tests.description: Tribal areas Scheduled and Tribal Areas

tests.title: CT 14: Law & Constitution (Official Language)
tests.description: Official language of the Republic of India

tests.title: CT 15: Law & Constitution (Emergency Provisions)
tests.description: National Emergency, President Emergency, Financial Emergency

tests.title: CT 16: Law & Constitution (Judiciary)
tests.description: Supreme Court, High Court and Subordinate Courts

tests.title: CT 17: Law & Constitution (Constitutional Bodies)
tests.description: Election Commission, Union Public Service Commission, State Public Service Commission

tests.title: CT 18: Law & Constitution (Non-Constitutional Bodies I)
tests.description: National Development Council, National Human Rights Commission, Central Information Commission, Central Bureau of Investigation, Lokpal and Lokayukta

tests.title: CT 19: Law & Constitution (Non-Constitutional Bodies II)
tests.description: NITI Aayog, Central Information Commission, State Information Commission, State Human Rights Commission, Central Vigilance Commission.

tests.title: CT 20: Law & Constitution (Basic Law - IPC and CrPC)
tests.description: Basic Law Indian Penal Code And Code Of Criminal Procedure

tests.title: CT 21: Law & Constitution (Legal Provisions I)
tests.description: Legal Provisions Related To Protection of Women and Children

tests.title: CT 22: Law & Constitution (Legal Provisions II)
tests.description: Legal Provisions Related Members of Scheduled Castes etc.

tests.title: CT 23: Law & Constitution (Traffic Rules)
tests.description: Traffic signs, Signals and markings, Rules, Safe driving practices, Traffic violations and penalties, Dealing with accidents and emergencies

tests.title: CT 24: Law & Constitution (Environment Protection)
tests.description: Environment and its components, Causes and effects of environmental degradation, Environmental laws and conventions, Pollution control measures, Conservation of natural resources, Sustainable Development

tests.title: CT 25: Law & Constitution (Wild Life Protection)
tests.description: Importance of wildlife and biodiversity, threats to wildlife and their habitats, conservation and management of wildlife, wildlife conservation laws and policies

tests.title: CT 26: Law & Constitution (Human Rights Protection)
tests.description: Human rights and their significance, Universal Declaration of Human Rights, International and national human rights laws and policies, Violations of human rights and their redressal, Protection of vulnerable groups

tests.title: CT 27: Law & Constitution (Right To Information Act)
tests.description: Salient features of the RTI Act, Procedure for filing and processing RTI applications, Role of public authorities in implementing the Act

tests.title: CT 28: Law & Constitution (Income Tax Act)
tests.description: Basic Concepts of Income Tax, Computation of Income and Tax Liability, Deductions and Exemptions under the Act, Filing of Income Tax Return

tests.title: CT 29: Law & Constitution (Prevention Of Corruption Act)
tests.description: Provisions of the Prevention of Corruption Act, Role of anti-corruption agencies in preventing and detecting corruption

tests.title: CT 30: Law & Constitution (National Security Act)
tests.description: Understanding the concept of national security, Provisions of the National Security Act, Role of law enforcement agencies in ensuring national security

tests.title: CT 31: Law & Constitution (IT Act)
tests.description: Provisions of the IT Act, Protection of digital information and privacy, Cyber crimes and their investigation and prosecution, Challenges in enforcing the IT Act

tests.title: CT 32: Law & Constitution (Cyber Crime)
tests.description: Concept of cyber crime, Types of cyber crimes, Prevention and detection of cyber crimes

tests.title: CT 33: Law & Constitution (Public Interest Litigation)
tests.description: Role of PIL in protecting individual and public interest, Procedure for filing and processing PIL cases, Historical judgments in PIL cases, Limitations and Challenges of PIL

tests.title: CT 34: Law & Constitution (Important Judicial Decisions)
tests.description: Historical Judgments by the Supreme Court of India, Judicial Interpretation of the Constitution and Laws, Importance of Judicial Judgments in Shaping Public Policy, Role of Judiciary.

tests.title: CT 35: Law & Constitution (Land Reforms & Acquisition)
tests.description: Concept of Land Reforms, Objectives and Strategy of Land Reforms, Land Acquisition Policies and Laws, Compensation for Land Acquisition, Challenges and Disputes in Land Acquisition

tests.title: CT 36: Law & Constitution (Land Revenue Laws)
tests.description: Concept of land revenue, Types of land revenue system in India, Land revenue policies and laws, Revenue administration and record-keeping, Role of revenue officials in land management.
